{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ADB |model=P.DG A4001N |revision=(A-000-1A1-AE/AX) |asin= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=DareGlobal |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=05/22/2013 |fcc_id=RS3A4001N |pcb_id=PWB:T00469D6B-G |type=wireless router,dsl modem |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63281 |cpu1_cspeed=320 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=SPI |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9725G6JB-25 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43224 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=ADSL2+ |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=D4:D1:84 |oui_eth=D4:D1:84 }}
"PWB:T00469D6B-G" and "DAT:10.10.25" is silkscreened on the board. :Presumed D4:D1:84 OUI based on the FCC EUT's MAC label..
*[https://openwrt.org/toh/adb/p.dg_a4001n ''ADB P.DG A4001N'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
